creator: Creamson Intelli
descriptionHtml:
VPS Jalangi– The Learning App is India’s only English language learning solution with Integrated modules covering English school syllabus for students of WB Board, CBSE, ICSE, and ISC and communication modules mapped on CEFR.

VPS Jalangi – The Learning App provides a unique blended learning approach which develops overall comprehension skills in English and helps students to secure better marks in CBSE, ICSE, State Boards and K-12 school examinations. High quality learning modules and interactive video classes for CBSE, ICSE, WB Board English syllabus help students visualise the concepts and increases the recall factor. Better concepts lead to higher marks!

Learn from the Best English Teachers in a stress free, fun and engaging environment:
At VPS Jalangi – The Learning App, our teachers are seasoned and passionate professionals, who ignite imagination and instil the love for English learning in students. Equipped with the latest teaching techniques, our teachers help students visualise concepts and help develop conceptual understanding of English.

Marks & Fluency - Syllabus made interesting with interactive content:
In VPS Jalangi – The Learning App, English K-12 school syllabus content is mapped to class and board (NCERT, CBSE, ICSE, ISC & State Boards). Sectioned under prose, poetry, drama, grammar and writing skills, each chapter is supported with additional reference material and AI based adaptive tests relevant to the syllabus.

Personalised Roadmap - Learn with confidence, rewind & recall:
At VPS Jalangi – The Learning App, we believe every student has his unique learning ability, we recognise that the learning needs of no two students are the same. Our AI enabled platform helps design personalised roadmaps for each student based on adaptability and speed, clearly identifying strengths and scope of improvement.

Adaptive Assessment - AI Based Assessment Module with 500000+ unique questions:
VPS Jalangi – The Learning App’s AI Based adaptive and interactive assessments at the end of each chapter help students to master the concepts of English as per school and board syllabus. Multiple formats make assessments interesting and provide a detailed quantitative analysis of progress.

Communicate with Confidence - Beginner to Advance level language training mapped to board curriculum and international standards:
VPS Jalangi – The Learning App’s unique delivery system features
• Curriculum based English learning mapped to NCERT, CBSE, ICSE, ISC & State Boards
• CEFR Guided Sessions and Assessments for communication modules
• AI Guided personalised study plan for each student
• Role Play based active learning methodology
• Modelled approach to progressive story telling by the Student

Key Features:

CBSE
• CBSE syllabus,
• Video Classes for Prose, Poetry, Grammar, Writing Skills
• Downloadable Videos
• CBSE Sample Papers,
• CBSE Board Test Papers
• NCERT Exemplaire solutions
• CBSE Question Bank
• Chapter-wise important questions

ICSE
• ICSE syllabus
• Video Classes for Prose, Poetry, Grammar, Writing Skills
• Downloadable Videos
• ICSE Semple Paper,
• ICSE Board Test Papers
• ICSE Question Bank
• Chapter-wise important questions

West Bengal Board of Secondary Education / Madhyamik / Uccha Madhyamik
• West Bengal Board syllabus
• Video Classes for Prose, Poetry, Grammar, Writing Skills
• Downloadable Videos
• West Bengal Board Sample Papers,
• West Bengal Board Test Papers
• West Bengal Board Question Bank
• Chapter-wise important questions

BESM - Board of Secondary Education, Manipur
• BESM syllabus
• Video Classes for Prose, Poetry, Grammar, Writing Skills
• Downloadable Videos
• BESM Sample Papers,
• BESM Test Papers
• BESM Question Bank
• Chapter-wise important questions

Adaptive Testing
• Test & Assessment after every chapter
• Self-Assessment Module
• Mock Tests
• Online Live Testing with 500000+ unique questions
